description:
Due to the dedicated viewership of all our Floatplane members, Colton gets a tattoo. 
Mission accomplished! We'll do it again sometime. 

This video is available for 48 hours on YouTube; Floatplane subscribers can watch the full video, and much more at https://lmg.gg/floatplane2024.
